com.ibm.xmi.framework
Class XMIHandler

com.ibm.xmi.framework.XMIHandler
public class XMIHandler

This class implements the SAX handler class and passes the methods to the appropriate loader, which also implements the SAX handler base class. This class creates the appropriate loader, depending on whether the document is for XMI 1.0 or XMI 1.1, and also depending on whether the document is loaded into a workspace or not.
